question: What is the main contribution of the proposed Skip Transformer-XL (STrXL) architecture in the context of Wave Energy Converters (WECs) and how does it improve their performance?
answer: The main contribution of the proposed Skip Transformer-XL (STrXL) architecture is that it performs better and trains faster than state-of-the-art transformers for WEC control, boosting energy efficiency by an average of 25% to 28% over the existing spring damper controller, and almost eliminating mechanical stress from the rotational yaw motion.
